house_listing.house_description: This single family home built in 1970 has 3 bedroom(s), 2 bath(s) . Rooms include dining room, family room, master bedroom. Features include view, patio, air conditioning, storage space.

residential_listing_-_feature_details.rooms: Dining Room, Family Room, Master Bedroom

house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Breakfast Bar, Cable TV, Ceiling Fan(s), Dishwasher, Storage Space
